text: United States National Arboretum is the national arboretum of the United States. It is located in Washington, D.C. == Related pages== * List of botanical gardens == Other websites == *United States National Arboretum *Friends of the National Arboretum *Save The Azaleas Category:Botanical gardens in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Washington, D.C.
title: United States National Arboretum
